a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTCholeraWCRBSVaccine2DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC-rBS vaccine 2 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a cholera vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Whole cell-recombinant B subunit (WC-rBS) vaccine, 2-dose schedule for clients aged over 5 years * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTCholeraWCRBSVaccine2DosesLogic

def.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No cholera primary series dose was administered"

operand.name: Client's age is more than 5 years
No cholera primary series dose was administered

def.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "At least one cholera primary series dose was administered"
"Dose number of the latest primary series dose is one"
"The latest cholera dose was administered more than 1 week and less than 6 weeks ago"

operand.name: Client's age is more than 5 years
At least one cholera primary series dose was administered
Dose number of the latest primary series dose is one
The latest cholera dose was administered more than 1 week and less than 6 weeks ago

def.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "At least one cholera primary series dose was administered"
"Dose number of the latest primary series dose is more than or equal to two"
"The latest cholera dose was administered approximately more than 2 years ago {Member States defined interval}"

def.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for cholera vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no cholera doses have been administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered approximately more than 2 years ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no cholera doses have been administered. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered approximately more than 2 years ago. Check for contraindications.

"Dose number of the latest primary series dose is one"
"The latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago"

def.name: Client is not due for cholera vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for cholera vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no cholera doses have been administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for cholera vaccination"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the latest cholera dose was administered approximately less than 2 years ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered approximately more than 2 years ago. Check for contraindications.'
